Services

As a versatile developer, I offer a range of specialized services to help bring your projects to life. I'm available for freelance projects, contract roles, and full-time opportunities.

Full Stack Development

Comprehensive web and application development with both frontend and backend expertise.

  • Responsive web applications using React, HTML/CSS
  • RESTful API development with Node.js, Python
  • Database design and integration (SQL, NoSQL)
  • Modern UI/UX implementation with Tailwind CSS
  • Performance optimization and testing
  • Cross-platform mobile development

Ideal for:

Startups, businesses needing custom web applications, or established companies looking to modernize their digital presence

Cloud/Solutions Architecture

Strategic cloud infrastructure design and implementation for optimal performance and cost efficiency.

  • Microsoft Azure deployments and management
  • Scalable infrastructure design for growing applications
  • Microservices architecture implementation
  • DevOps integration and CI/CD pipelines
  • Security implementation and best practices
  • Cost optimization strategies
  • Migration from legacy systems to cloud platforms

Ideal for:

Companies looking to migrate to the cloud, optimize existing cloud infrastructure, or implement scalable solutions for growing user bases

AI Development

Custom AI and machine learning solutions to enhance applications and provide intelligent features.

  • AI integration in web/mobile applications
  • Intelligent chatbot development
  • Data analysis and visualization systems
  • Personalized recommendation systems
  • Natural language processing implementations
  • Computer vision solutions
  • AI-powered automation for business processes

Ideal for:

Businesses looking to implement AI-driven features, automate processes, or gain insights from existing data

My Development Approach

Collaborative Process

I believe in close collaboration with clients throughout the development process. Regular communications and feedback loops ensure that the project evolves according to your vision and requirements.

Quality-Focused

I prioritize code quality, testing, and documentation. This approach leads to more maintainable solutions and fewer issues in the long run, saving both time and resources.

Future-Proof Solutions

I design solutions with scalability and future growth in mind. By using modern technologies and best practices, your applications will remain relevant and adaptable to changing needs.

Continuous Learning

I'm committed to staying at the forefront of technology through continuous learning and professional development. This ensures that I bring the latest and most effective solutions to your projects.

Availability & Engagement

Freelance Projects

Available for both short-term and long-term freelance projects. Flexible engagement models to suit your specific needs.

  • • Fixed-price contracts
  • • Hourly rate agreements
  • • Milestone-based payment

Contract Roles

Available for part-time and full-time contract positions. Ideal for projects requiring ongoing development or maintenance.

  • • 3-6 month contracts
  • • Part-time (10-20 hours/week)
  • • Full-time (40 hours/week)

Full-Time Employment

Open to full-time employment opportunities with innovative companies. I thrive in collaborative environments focused on growth and continuous improvement.

  • • Remote-first positions
  • • Hybrid arrangements
  • • Philadelphia area on-site
